MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CP820201497
Licensee Name: Michigan Department of Human Services
Licensee Address: 235 South Grand Avenue
Lansing, MI 48902
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 373-3768
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Charlotte Kennedy, Administrator
Maura Corrigan, Designee
Name of Facility: Wayne County DHS - Western
Facility Address: 4505 Oakman Blvd.
Detroit, MI 48204
Facility Telephone #: (313) 934-8910
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, FIA
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Wayne County DHS – Western District vacated the office at 25350 Ecorse Rd in
Taylor and moved to an office at 4505 Oakman Blvd. in Detroit.
III. Methodology
An on-site inspection by this consultant was completed on 1/14/14. The former local
office Director, Dianna Pyles, retired in October 2013. The new Acting Director is
Charlotte Kennedy. Ms. Kennedy’s fingerprints are pending.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
This consultant toured the facility. The building is about half the size of the former
one and in a much less convenient location for the clients it serves. The agency has
formed relationships with churches and business owners in the Western Wayne
community. These community-based organizations have offered space for mobile
staff and supervised foster care visits. Often, there are not enough on-site parking
spaces for all of the employees. Most office-bound staff share a cubicle. The
parking lot has inadequate lighting, which is being addressed. The lobby and three
employee entrances/exits are monitored by two security guards and four security
cameras. The restrooms, kitchen and file storage areas are adequate.
V. Recommendation
I recommend this agency continue its current license at the new location.
January 15, 2014
________________________________________
Deborah Will Date
Licensing Consultant
2
